BR_text.BRsummary: API "/api/v1/nni/trial-jobs/xxx" doesn't show a trial's all parameters in multiphase experiment
BR_text.BRdescription:
:
 When I click the link,
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659229-7b6c9d00-9e87-11e9-88b5-7916501cf356.png></denchmark-link>
 
 I find that trial's parameters only have one rather than all parameters.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659242-832c4180-9e87-11e9-8a02-66eb8d008774.png></denchmark-link>
 
 In api/v1/nni/trial-jobs, I see all parameters in a trial.
 <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/60659288-993a0200-9e87-11e9-914e-73ffa9d96e10.png></denchmark-link>

 is conda or virtualenv used?:
 is running in docker?:
 
 need to update document(yes/no):
